comment._content: Read all about it - SMH 1/2/1897 p.6 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14086741 . At the bottom - "Just as Esmerelda and Secret crossed the line, with everything set, they both capsized. ... "

comment._content: Re Stevenson screen (see note) - we have one at the Mid North Coast Maritime Museum - maps.google.com.au/maps?q=Mid+North+Coast+Maritime+Museum...
